44.1.hd_quote: The establishment of frameworks as the result of interaction.
44.1.behavioral_axis: Builds a clear container before engaging; knows the tribe needs rules to prosper.
44.1.shadow_axis: Doesn’t apply conditions because it wants harmony / friendship more than correctness.

44.2.hd_quote: The development and management of a proper collective structure.
44.2.behavioral_axis: Focuses on the objective and organizes people around it.
44.2.shadow_axis: Over-focus on goals → ignores weaker elements → qualitative failure in the human field.

44.3.hd_quote: The failure to interact based on circumstances.
44.3.behavioral_axis: Senses the other’s ego power and prepares or withdraws.
44.3.shadow_axis: Makes/breaks bonds too fast; fear of past egos blocks correct alliances.

44.4.hd_quote: The refusal to engage in hypocritical interaction.
44.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes the tribal management style through blunt, transparent interaction.
44.4.shadow_axis: Can appear cold/indifferent; may later return to rejected contacts pragmatically.

44.5.hd_quote: The ability to transform interaction with inferior elements into the energizing of progressive processes.
44.5.behavioral_axis: Places everyone where they can contribute, while preserving material immunity of the tribe.
44.5.shadow_axis: Becomes abusive / dictatorial: “I have the power and you don’t. Do what you’re told.”

44.6.hd_quote: The awareness of patterns, which ensures one's instinctive well-being.
44.6.behavioral_axis: Pulls back from ordinary meetings to wait for the truly correct ego / new form.
44.6.shadow_axis: Detached, hard to access, may bolster ego at others’ expense if misaligned.
